title: Textile
description: All-over pattern of small adjacent diamonds in purple, red, green, yellow, and undyed silk, with four tie-dye rosettes in each diamond. Guard border with diamonds, scallops on two long sides of skirt. Broad transverse and in middle of skirt with lobed medallions down center of rectangular field, flanked by deep toothed border. Guard bands with scallops and small circular medallions at sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Technique: tie-dye. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-23-a.
